abstract: Gojko Kačar (Serbian Cyrillic: Гојко Качар, born 26 January 1987) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Cerezo Osaka on loan from Bundesliga side Hamburger SV. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
comment: Gojko Kačar (Serbian Cyrillic: Гојко Качар, born 26 January 1987) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Cerezo Osaka on loan from Bundesliga side Hamburger SV. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
